chatHistory.content: <usertask>Напиши приложение на SwiftUI, дизайн должен быть красивым и ярким. Вот описание: Bizpark — это легкое приложение, созданное для сбора бизнес-идей, как только они приходят вам в голову. Добавьте название и краткое описание, чтобы сохранить любую концепцию — будь то продукт, услуга или идея стартапа. Ваши идеи сохраняются в простом списке, который вы можете прокручивать или удалять в любое время.</usertask>

<write_to_file>
<path>Models/BusinessIdea.swift</path>
<content>
1|import Foundation
2|
3|struct BusinessIdea: Identifiable, Codable, Equatable {
4|    let id: UUID
5|    var title: String
6|    var description: String
7|    var createdAt: Date
8|    
9|    init(id: UUID = UUID(), title: String, description: String, createdAt: Date = Date()) {
10|        self.id = id
11|        self.title = title
12|        self.description = description
13|        self.createdAt = createdAt
14|    }
15|}
</content>
</write_to_file>

<write_to_file>
<path>ViewModels/BusinessIdeasViewModel.swift</path>
<content>
1|import Foundation
2|import SwiftUI
3|
4|class BusinessIdeasViewModel: ObservableObject {
5|    @Published var ideas: [BusinessIdea] = []
6|    private let saveKey = "SavedBusinessIdeas"
7|    
8|    init() {
9|        loadIdeas()
10|    }
11|    
12|    func addIdea(title: String, description: String) {
13|        let idea = BusinessIdea(title: title, description: description)
14|        ideas.insert(idea, at: 0)
15|        saveIdeas()
16|    }
17|    
18|    func deleteIdea(at offsets: IndexSet) {
19|        ideas.remove(atOffsets: offsets)
20|        saveIdeas()
21|    }
22|    
23|    private func saveIdeas() {
24|        if let encoded = try? JSONEncoder().encode(ideas) {
25|            UserDefaults.standard.set(encoded, forKey: saveKey)
26|        }
27|    }
28|    
29|    private func loadIdeas() {
30|        if let data = UserDefaults.standard.data(forKey: saveKey),
31|           let decoded = try? JSONDecoder().decode([BusinessIdea].self, from: data) {
32|            ideas = decoded
33|        }
34|    }
35|}
</content>
</write_to_file>

<write_to_file>
<path>Views/AddIdeaView.swift</path>
<content>
1|import SwiftUI
2|
3|struct AddIdeaView: View {
4|    @Environment(\.dismiss) private var dismiss
5|    @ObservedObject var viewModel: BusinessIdeasViewModel
6|    
7|    @State private var title = ""
8|    @State private var description = ""
9|    @FocusState private var focusedField: Field?
10|    
11|    enum Field {
12|        case title, description
13|    }
14|    
15|    var body: some View {
16|        NavigationView {
17|            Form {
18|                Section {
19|                    TextField("Idea Title", text: $title)
20|                        .focused($focusedField, equals: .title)
21|                        .font(.headline)
22|                        .submitLabel(.next)
23|                    
24|                    TextEditor(text: $description)
25|                        .focused($focusedField, equals: .description)
26|                        .frame(height: 150)
27|                        .font(.body)
28|                }
29|            }
30|            .scrollDismissesKeyboard(.immediately)
31|            .navigationTitle("New Business Idea")
32|            .navigationBarTitleDisplayMode(.inline)
33|            .toolbar {
34|                ToolbarItem(placement: .navigationBarLeading) {
35|                    Button("Cancel") {
36|                        dismiss()
37|                    }
38|                }
39|                
40|                ToolbarItem(placement: .navigationBarTrailing) {
41|                    Button("Save") {
42|                        saveIdea()
43|                    }
44|                    .disabled(title.isEmpty || description.isEmpty)
45|                }
46|                
47|                ToolbarItemGroup(placement: .keyboard) {
48|                    Spacer()
49|                    Button(focusedField == .title ? "Next" : "Done") {
50|                        if focusedField == .title {
51|                            focusedField = .description
52|                        } else {
53|                            focusedField = nil
54|                        }
55|                    }
56|                }
57|            }
58|        }
59|    }
60|    
61|    private func saveIdea() {
62|        viewModel.addIdea(title: title.trimmingCharacters(in: .whitespacesAndNewlines),
63|                         description: description.trimmingCharacters(in: .whitespacesAndNewlines))
64|        dismiss()
65|    }
66|}
</content>
</write_to_file>

<write_to_file>
<path>Views/IdeaCardView.swift</path>
<content>
1|import SwiftUI
2|
3|struct IdeaCardView: View {
4|    let idea: BusinessIdea
5|    
6|    var body: some View {
7|        VStack(alignment: .leading, spacing: 12) {
8|            Text(idea.title)
9|                .font(.title2)
10|                .fontWeight(.bold)
11|                .foregroundColor(.primary)
12|            
13|            Text(idea.description)
14|                .font(.body)
15|                .foregroundColor(.secondary)
16|                .lineLimit(3)
17|            
18|            HStack {
19|                Image(systemName: "clock")
20|                    .foregroundColor(.secondary)
21|                Text(idea.createdAt.formatted(date: .abbreviated, time: .shortened))
22|                    .font(.caption)
23|                    .foregroundColor(.secondary)
24|                Spacer()
25|            }
26|        }
27|        .padding()
28|        .background(
29|            RoundedRectangle(cornerRadius: 16)
30|                .fill(Color(.systemBackground))
31|                .shadow(color: Color.black.opacity(0.1), radius: 10, x: 0, y: 5)
32|        )
33|        .padding(.horizontal)
34|        .padding(.vertical, 4)
35|    }
36|}
</content>
</write_to_file>

<write_to_file>
<path>Views/ContentView.swift</path>
<content>
1|import SwiftUI
2|
3|struct ContentView: View {
4|    @StateObject private var viewModel = BusinessIdeasViewModel()
5|    @State private var showingAddIdea = false
6|    
7|    var body: some View {
8|        NavigationView {
9|            ZStack {
10|                LinearGradient(
11|                    gradient: Gradient(colors: [Color.blue.opacity(0.1), Color.purple.opacity(0.1)]),
12|                    startPoint: .topLeading,
13|                    endPoint: .bottomTrailing
14|                )
15|                .ignoresSafeArea()
16|                
17|                ScrollView {
18|                    if viewModel.ideas.isEmpty {
19|                        VStack(spacing: 20) {
20|                            Image(systemName: "lightbulb")
21|                                .font(.system(size: 60))
22|                                .foregroundColor(.yellow)
23|                            
24|                            Text("No Business Ideas Yet")
25|                                .font(.title2)
26|                                .fontWeight(.bold)
27|                            
28|                            Text("Tap the + button to add your first business idea!")
29|                                .foregroundColor(.secondary)
30|                                .multilineTextAlignment(.center)
31|                                .padding(.horizontal)
32|                        }
33|                        .frame(maxWidth: .infinity, maxHeight: .infinity)
34|                        .padding(.top, 100)
35|                    } else {
36|                        LazyVStack(spacing: 0) {
37|                            ForEach(viewModel.ideas) { idea in
38|                                IdeaCardView(idea: idea)
39|                                    .transition(.opacity)
40|                            }
41|                            .onDelete(perform: viewModel.deleteIdea)
42|                        }
43|                        .padding(.vertical)
44|                    }
45|                }
46|            }
47|            .navigationTitle("Bizpark")
48|            .toolbar {
49|                ToolbarItem(placement: .navigationBarTrailing) {
50|                    Button {
51|                        showingAddIdea = true
52|                    } label: {
53|                        Image(systemName: "plus.circle.fill")
54|                            .font(.title2)
55|                    }
56|                }
57|            }
58|            .sheet(isPresented: $showingAddIdea) {
59|                AddIdeaView(viewModel: viewModel)
60|            }
61|        }
62|    }
63|}
</content>
</write_to_file>

<usertask>добавь в приложение возможность переключения на темную тему
(кнопки Rate this app, Share this app, Terms of use, Privacy policy).
(Кнопки  Privacy policy и Terms of use должны вести на экраны с текстом)
(Кнопка “Rate this app” должна открывать App Store с ссылкой на приложение, а не request review.)</usertask>

<write_to_file>
<path>Views/SettingsView.swift</path>
<content>
1|import SwiftUI
2|
3|struct SettingsView: View {
4|    @AppStorage("isDarkMode") private var isDarkMode = false
5|    @Environment(\.openURL) private var openURL
6|    @State private var showingTerms = false
7|    @State private var showingPrivacy = false
8|    
9|    private let appStoreId = "YOUR_APP_STORE_ID" // Replace with your actual App Store ID
10|    
11|    var body: some View {
12|        List {
13|            Section {
14|                Toggle(isOn: $isDarkMode) {
15|                    Label("Dark Mode", systemImage: "moon.fill")
16|                }
17|            }
18|            
19|            Section {
20|                Button {
21|                    shareApp()
22|                } label: {
23|                    Label("Share App", systemImage: "square.and.arrow.up")
24|                }
25|                
26|                Button {
27|                    rateApp()
28|                } label: {
29|                    Label("Rate This App", systemImage: "star.fill")
30|                }
31|            }
32|            
33|            Section {
34|                Button {
35|                    showingTerms = true
36|                } label: {
37|                    Label("Terms of Use", systemImage: "doc.text")
38|                }
39|                
40|                Button {
41|                    showingPrivacy = true
42|                } label: {
43|                    Label("Privacy Policy", systemImage: "hand.raised.fill")
44|                }
45|            }
46|        }
47|        .navigationTitle("Settings")
48|        .sheet(isPresented: $showingTerms) {
49|            TermsView()
50|        }
51|        .sheet(isPresented: $showingPrivacy) {
52|            PrivacyView()
53|        }
54|    }
55|    
56|    private func shareApp() {
57|        let appUrl = URL(string: "https://apps.apple.com/app/id\(appStoreId)")!
58|        let activityVC = UIActivityViewController(
59|            activityItems: ["Check out Bizpark!", appUrl],
60|            applicationActivities: nil
61|        )
62|        
63|        if let windowScene = UIApplication.shared.connectedScenes.first as? UIWindowScene,
64|           let window = windowScene.windows.first,
65|           let rootVC = window.rootViewController {
66|            activityVC.popoverPresentationController?.sourceView = rootVC.view
67|            rootVC.present(activityVC, animated: true)
68|        }
69|    }
70|    
71|    private func rateApp() {
72|        let appStoreURL = URL(string: "https://apps.apple.com/app/id\(appStoreId)?action=write-review")!
73|        openURL(appStoreURL)
74|    }
75|}
</content>
</write_to_file>

<write_to_file>
<path>Views/TermsView.swift</path>
<content>
1|import SwiftUI
2|
3|struct TermsView: View {
4|    @Environment(\.dismiss) private var dismiss
5|    
6|    var body: some View {
7|        NavigationView {
8|            ScrollView {
9|                VStack(alignment: .leading, spacing: 20) {
10|                    Group {
11|                        Text("Terms of Use")
12|                            .font(.title)
13|                            .fontWeight(.bold)
14|                        
15|                        Text("Last Updated: \(Date().formatted(date: .long, time: .omitted))")
16|                            .foregroundColor(.secondary)
17|                        
18|                        Text("1. Acceptance of Terms")
19|                            .font(.headline)
20|                        Text("By accessing and using Bizpark, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement.")
21|                        
22|                        Text("2. Use License")
23|                            .font(.headline)
24|                        Text("This is a personal, non-exclusive, non-transferable license to use Bizpark for storing and managing your business ideas.")
25|                        
26|                        Text("3. Disclaimer")
27|                            .font(.headline)
28|                        Text("The app is provided 'as is' without warranties of any kind, either expressed or implied.")
29|                        
30|                        Text("4. Limitations")
31|                            .font(.headline)
32|                        Text("You may not: (a) modify or copy the materials; (b) use the materials for any commercial purpose; (c) attempt to decompile or reverse engineer any software contained in Bizpark.")
33|                    }
34|                }
35|                .padding()
36|            }
37|            .navigationBarTitleDisplayMode(.inline)
38|            .toolbar {
39|                ToolbarItem(placement: .navigationBarTrailing) {
40|                    Button("Done") {
41|                        dismiss()
42|                    }
43|                }
44|            }
45|        }
46|    }
47|}
</content>
</write_to_file>

<usertask>После добавления новой карточки поля ввода очищаются, и пользователь возвращается на первую вкладку таббара.
Появляется уведомление об успешном добавлении.
Detail View должен быть кастомным, с кнопками редактировать, удалить, поделиться.
Дизайн должен быть юзерфрендли, с яркими элементами.
добавь в приложение возможность переключения на темную тему
сдеалай возможность вносить не целые числа
карточки должны сохраняться при перезапуске приложения</usertask>

<write_to_file>
<path>Models/BusinessIdea.swift</path>
<content>
1|import Foundation
2|
3|struct BusinessIdea: Identifiable, Codable, Equatable {
4|    let id: UUID
5|    var title: String
6|    var description: String
7|    var createdAt: Date
8|    var budget: Double?
9|    
10|    init(id: UUID = UUID(), title: String, description: String, budget: Double? = nil, createdAt: Date = Date()) {
11|        self.id = id
12|        self.title = title
13|        self.description = description
14|        self.budget = budget
15|        self.createdAt = createdAt
16|    }
17|}
</content>
</write_to_file>

<write_to_file>
<path>Views/IdeaDetailView.swift</path>
<content>
1|import SwiftUI
2|
3|struct IdeaDetailView: View {
4|    @Environment(\.dismiss) private var dismiss
5|    @ObservedObject var viewModel: BusinessIdeasViewModel
6|    let idea: BusinessIdea
7|    
8|    @State private var showingEditSheet = false
9|    @State private var showingDeleteAlert = false
10|    
11|    var body: some View {
12|        ScrollView {
13|            VStack(alignment: .leading, spacing: 24) {
14|                VStack(alignment: .leading, spacing: 12) {
15|                    Text(idea.title)
16|                        .font(.title)
17|                        .fontWeight(.bold)
18|                    
19|                    Text(idea.createdAt.formatted(date: .long, time: .shortened))
20|                        .font(.subheadline)
21|                        .foregroundColor(.secondary)
22|                }
23|                .frame(maxWidth: .infinity, alignment: .leading)
24|                .padding()
25|                .background(
26|                    RoundedRectangle(cornerRadius: 16)
27|                        .fill(Color.accentColor.opacity(0.1))
28|                )
29|                
30|                VStack(alignment: .leading, spacing: 8) {
31|                    Text("Description")
32|                        .font(.headline)
33|                    
34|                    Text(idea.description)
35|                        .lineSpacing(4)
36|                }
37|                
38|                if let budget = idea.budget {
39|                    VStack(alignment: .leading, spacing: 8) {
40|                        Text("Estimated Budget")
41|                            .font(.headline)
42|                        
43|                        Text(String(format: "$%.2f", budget))
44|                            .font(.title2)
45|                            .foregroundColor(.green)
46|                    }
47|                }
48|                
49|                HStack(spacing: 16) {
50|                    Button(action: {
51|                        showingEditSheet = true
52|                    }) {
53|                        Label("Edit", systemImage: "pencil")
54|                            .frame(maxWidth: .infinity)
55|                    }
56|                    .buttonStyle(.bordered)
57|                    .tint(.blue)
58|                    
59|                    Button(action: {
60|                        shareIdea()
61|                    }) {
62|                        Label("Share", systemImage: "square.and.arrow.up")
63|                            .frame(maxWidth: .infinity)
64|                    }
65|                    .buttonStyle(.bordered)
66|                    .tint(.green)
67|                }
68|                
69|                Button(action: {
70|                    showingDeleteAlert = true
71|                }) {
72|                    Label("Delete Idea", systemImage: "trash")
73|                        .frame(maxWidth: .infinity)
74|                }
75|                .buttonStyle(.bordered)
76|                .tint(.red)
77|            }
78|            .padding()
79|        }
80|        .navigationBarTitleDisplayMode(.inline)
81|        .sheet(isPresented: $showingEditSheet) {
82|            EditIdeaView(viewModel: viewModel, idea: idea)
83|        }
84|        .alert("Delete Idea", isPresented: $showingDeleteAlert) {
85|            Button("Delete", role: .destructive) {
86|                deleteIdea()
87|            }
88|            Button("Cancel", role: .cancel) { }
89|        } message: {
90|            Text("Are you sure you want to delete this idea? This action cannot be undone.")
91|        }
92|    }
93|    
94|    private func shareIdea() {
95|        let shareText = """
96|        Business Idea: \(idea.title)
97|        
98|        Description:
99|        \(idea.description)
100|        
101|        \(idea.budget.map { String(format: "Estimated Budget: $%.2f", $0) } ?? "")
102|        
103|        Shared from Bizpark
104|        """
105|        
106|        let av = UIActivityViewController(
107|            activityItems: [shareText],
108|            applicationActivities: nil
109|        )
110|        
111|        if let windowScene = UIApplication.shared.connectedScenes.first as? UIWindowScene,
112|           let window = windowScene.windows.first,
113|           let rootVC = window.rootViewController {
114|            av.popoverPresentationController?.sourceView = rootVC.view
115|            rootVC.present(av, animated: true)
116|        }
117|    }
118|    
119|    private func deleteIdea() {
120|        viewModel.deleteIdea(withId: idea.id)
121|        dismiss()
122|    }
123|}
</content>
</write_to_file>

<write_to_file>
<path>Views/EditIdeaView.swift</path>
<content>
1|import SwiftUI
2|
3|struct EditIdeaView: View {
4|    @Environment(\.dismiss) private var dismiss
5|    @ObservedObject var viewModel: BusinessIdeasViewModel
6|    let idea: BusinessIdea
7|    
8|    @State private var title: String
9|    @State private var description: String
10|    @State private var budget: String
11|    @FocusState private var focusedField: Field?
12|    
13|    enum Field {
14|        case title, description, budget
15|    }
16|    
17|    init(viewModel: BusinessIdeasViewModel, idea: BusinessIdea) {
18|        self.viewModel = viewModel
19|        self.idea = idea
20|        _title = State(initialValue: idea.title)
21|        _description = State(initialValue: idea.description)
22|        _budget = State(initialValue: idea.budget.map { String(format: "%.2f", $0) } ?? "")
23|    }
24|    
25|    var body: some View {
26|        NavigationView {
27|            Form {
28|                Section {
29|                    TextField("Title", text: $title)
30|                        .focused($focusedField, equals: .title)
31|                        .font(.headline)
32|                        .submitLabel(.next)
33|                    
34|                    TextEditor(text: $description)
35|                        .focused($focusedField, equals: .description)
36|                        .frame(height: 150)
37|                    
38|                    TextField("Budget (Optional)", text: $budget)
39|                        .focused($focusedField, equals: .budget)
40|                        .keyboardType(.decimalPad)
41|                        .submitLabel(.done)
42|                }
43|            }
44|            .navigationTitle("Edit Idea")
45|            .navigationBarTitleDisplayMode(.inline)
46|            .toolbar {
47|                ToolbarItem(placement: .navigationBarLeading) {
48|                    Button("Cancel") {
49|                        dismiss()
50|                    }
51|                }
52|                
53|                ToolbarItem(placement: .navigationBarTrailing) {
54|                    Button("Save") {
55|                        saveIdea()
56|                    }
57|                    .disabled(title.isEmpty || description.isEmpty)
58|                }
59|                
60|                ToolbarItemGroup(placement: .keyboard) {
61|                    Spacer()
62|                    Button(focusedField == .budget ? "Done" : "Next") {
63|                        switch focusedField {
64|                        case .title:
65|                            focusedField = .description
66|                        case .description:
67|                            focusedField = .budget
68|                        default:
69|                            focusedField = nil
70|                        }
71|                    }
72|                }
73|            }
74|        }
75|    }
76|    
77|    private func saveIdea() {
78|        let budgetValue = Double(budget.replacingOccurrences(of: ",", with: "."))
79|        viewModel.updateIdea(
80|            id: idea.id,
81|            title: title.trimmingCharacters(in: .whitespacesAndNewlines),
82|            description: description.trimmingCharacters(in: .whitespacesAndNewlines),
83|            budget: budgetValue
84|        )
85|        dismiss()
86|    }
87|}
</content>
</write_to_file>

<write_to_file>
<path>Views/AddIdeaView.swift</path>
<content>
1|import SwiftUI
2|
3|struct AddIdeaView: View {
4|    @Environment(\.dismiss) private var dismiss
5|    @ObservedObject var viewModel: BusinessIdeasViewModel
6|    
7|    @State private var title = ""
8|    @State private var description = ""
9|    @State private var budget = ""
10|    @FocusState private var focusedField: Field?
11|    
12|    enum Field {
13|        case title, description, budget
14|    }
15|    
16|    var body: some View {
17|        NavigationView {
18|            Form {
19|                Section {
20|                    TextField("Idea Title", text: $title)
21|                        .focused($focusedField, equals: .title)
22|                        .font(.headline)
23|                        .submitLabel(.next)
24|                    
25|                    TextEditor(text: $description)
26|                        .focused($focusedField, equals: .description)
27|                        .frame(height: 150)
28|                        .font(.body)
29|                    
30|                    TextField("Estimated Budget (Optional)", text: $budget)
31|                        .focused($focusedField, equals: .budget)
32|                        .keyboardType(.decimalPad)
33|                        .submitLabel(.done)
34|                }
35|            }
36|            .scrollDismissesKeyboard(.immediately)
37|            .navigationTitle("New Business Idea")
38|            .navigationBarTitleDisplayMode(.inline)
39|            .toolbar {
40|                ToolbarItem(placement: .navigationBarLeading) {
41|                    Button("Cancel") {
42|                        dismiss()
43|                    }
44|                }
45|                
46|                ToolbarItem(placement: .navigationBarTrailing) {
47|                    Button("Save") {
48|                        saveIdea()
49|                    }
50|                    .disabled(title.isEmpty || description.isEmpty)
51|                }
52|                
53|                ToolbarItemGroup(placement: .keyboard) {
54|                    Spacer()
55|                    Button(nextButtonTitle) {
56|                        handleNextButton()
57|                    }
58|                }
59|            }
60|        }
61|    }
62|    
63|    private var nextButtonTitle: String {
64|        switch focusedField {
65|        case .title:
66|            return "Next"
67|        case .description:
68|            return "Next"
69|        case .budget:
70|            return "Done"
71|        case .none:
72|            return "Done"
73|        }
74|    }
75|    
76|    private func handleNextButton() {
77|        switch focusedField {
78|        case .title:
79|            focusedField = .description
80|        case .description:
81|            focusedField = .budget
82|        case .budget:
83|            focusedField = nil
84|        case .none:
85|            break
86|        }
87|    }
88|    
89|    private func saveIdea() {
90|        let budgetValue = Double(budget.replacingOccurrences(of: ",", with: "."))
91|        viewModel.addIdea(
92|            title: title.trimmingCharacters(in: .whitespacesAndNewlines),
93|            description: description.trimmingCharacters(in: .whitespacesAndNewlines),
94|            budget: budgetValue
95|        )
96|        dismiss()
97|    }
98|}
</content>
</write_to_file>

<write_to_file>
<path>ViewModels/BusinessIdeasViewModel.swift</path>
<content>
1|import Foundation
2|import SwiftUI
3|
4|class BusinessIdeasViewModel: ObservableObject {
5|    @Published var ideas: [BusinessIdea] = []
6|    @Published var showSuccessNotification = false
7|    private let saveKey = "SavedBusinessIdeas"
8|    
9|    init() {
10|        loadIdeas()
11|    }
12|    
13|    func addIdea(title: String, description: String, budget: Double? = nil) {
14|        let idea = BusinessIdea(title: title, description: description, budget: budget)
15|        ideas.insert(idea, at: 0)
16|        saveIdeas()
17|        showSuccessNotification = true
18|        
19|        // Hide notification after 2 seconds
20|        DispatchQueue.main.asyncAfter(deadline: .now() + 2) {
21|            self.showSuccessNotification = false
22|        }
23|    }
24|    
25|    func updateIdea(id: UUID, title: String, description: String, budget: Double?) {
26|        if let index = ideas.firstIndex(where: { $0.id == id }) {
27|            ideas[index] = BusinessIdea(
28|                id: id,
29|                title: title,
30|                description: description,
31|                budget: budget,
32|                createdAt: ideas[index].createdAt
33|            )
34|            saveIdeas()
35|        }
36|    }
37|    
38|    func deleteIdea(at offsets: IndexSet) {
39|        ideas.remove(atOffsets: offsets)
40|        saveIdeas()
41|    }
42|    
43|    func deleteIdea(withId id: UUID) {
44|        ideas.removeAll { $0.id == id }
45|        saveIdeas()
46|    }
47|    
48|    private func saveIdeas() {
49|        if let encoded = try? JSONEncoder().encode(ideas) {
50|            UserDefaults.standard.set(encoded, forKey: saveKey)
51|        }
52|    }
53|    
54|    private func loadIdeas() {
55|        if let data = UserDefaults.standard.data(forKey: saveKey),
56|           let decoded = try? JSONDecoder().decode([BusinessIdea].self, from: data) {
57|            ideas = decoded
58|        }
59|    }
60|}
</content>
</write_to_file>

<write_to_file>
<path>Views/ContentView.swift</path>
<content>
1|import SwiftUI
2|
3|struct ContentView: View {
4|    @StateObject private var viewModel = BusinessIdeasViewModel()
5|    @State private var showingAddIdea = false
6|    @AppStorage("isDarkMode") private var isDarkMode = false
7|    
8|    var body: some View {
9|        NavigationView {
10|            ZStack {
11|                LinearGradient(
12|                    gradient: Gradient(colors: [Color.blue.opacity(0.1), Color.purple.opacity(0.1)]),
13|                    startPoint: .topLeading,
14|                    endPoint: .bottomTrailing
15|                )
16|                .ignoresSafeArea()
17|                
18|                ScrollView {
19|                    if viewModel.ideas.isEmpty {
20|                        VStack(spacing: 20) {
21|                            Image(systemName: "lightbulb")
22|                                .font(.system(size: 60))
23|                                .foregroundColor(.yellow)
24|                                .symbolEffect(.bounce)
25|                            
26|                            Text("No Business Ideas Yet")
27|                                .font(.title2)
28|                                .fontWeight(.bold)
29|                            
30|                            Text("Tap the + button to add your first business idea!")
31|                                .foregroundColor(.secondary)
32|                                .multilineTextAlignment(.center)
33|                                .padding(.horizontal)
34|                        }
35|                        .frame(maxWidth: .infinity, maxHeight: .infinity)
36|                        .padding(.top, 100)
37|                    } else {
38|                        LazyVStack(spacing: 0) {
39|                            ForEach(viewModel.ideas) { idea in
40|                                NavigationLink(destination: IdeaDetailView(viewModel: viewModel, idea: idea)) {
41|                                    IdeaCardView(idea: idea)
42|                                }
43|                            }
44|                        }
45|                        .padding(.vertical)
46|                    }
47|                }
48|                
49|                if viewModel.showSuccessNotification {
50|                    VStack {
51|                        Spacer()
52|                        HStack {
53|                            Image(systemName: "checkmark.circle.fill")
54|                                .foregroundColor(.green)
55|                            Text("Idea successfully added!")
56|                                .foregroundColor(.white)
57|                        }
58|                        .padding()
59|                        .background(Color.black.opacity(0.8))
60|                        .cornerRadius(25)
61|                        .padding(.bottom, 20)
62|                    }
63|                    .transition(.move(edge: .bottom))
64|                    .animation(.spring(), value: viewModel.showSuccessNotification)
65|                }
66|            }
67|            .navigationTitle("Bizpark")
68|            .toolbar {
69|                ToolbarItem(placement: .navigationBarLeading) {
70|                    NavigationLink(destination: SettingsView()) {
71|                        Image(systemName: "gearshape.fill")
72|                    }
73|                }
74|                
75|                ToolbarItem(placement: .navigationBarTrailing) {
76|                    Button {
77|                        showingAddIdea = true
78|                    } label: {
79|                        Image(systemName: "plus.circle.fill")
80|                            .font(.title2)
81|                    }
82|                }
83|            }
84|            .sheet(isPresented: $showingAddIdea) {
85|                AddIdeaView(viewModel: viewModel)
86|            }
87|        }
88|        .preferredColorScheme(isDarkMode ? .dark : .light)
89|    }
90|}
</content>
</write_to_file>

<write_to_file>
<path>Views/IdeaCardView.swift</path>
<content>
1|import SwiftUI
2|
3|struct IdeaCardView: View {
4|    let idea: BusinessIdea
5|    
6|    var body: some View {
7|        VStack(alignment: .leading, spacing: 12) {
8|            Text(idea.title)
9|                .font(.title2)
10|                .fontWeight(.bold)
11|                .foregroundColor(.primary)
12|            
13|            Text(idea.description)
14|                .font(.body)
15|                .foregroundColor(.secondary)
16|                .lineLimit(3)
17|            
18|            HStack {
19|                Image(systemName: "clock")
20|                    .foregroundColor(.secondary)
21|                Text(idea.createdAt.formatted(date: .abbreviated, time: .shortened))
22|                    .font(.caption)
23|                    .foregroundColor(.secondary)
24|                
25|                Spacer()
26|                
27|                if let budget = idea.budget {
28|                    Text(String(format: "$%.2f", budget))
29|                        .font(.callout)
30|                        .fontWeight(.semibold)
31|                        .foregroundColor(.green)
32|                }
33|            }
34|        }
35|        .padding()
36|        .background(
37|            RoundedRectangle(cornerRadius: 16)
38|                .fill(Color(.systemBackground))
39|                .shadow(color: Color.black.opacity(0.1), radius: 10, x: 0, y: 5)
40|        )
41|        .padding(.horizontal)
42|        .padding(.vertical, 4)
43|    }
44|}
</content>
</write_to_file>
